definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: When she was dressed to look like, is a lady.
sentences.chinese: 當她裝扮停當趕到時，看上去儼然是一位貴婦人。

sentences.english: The ground is already being prepared for two bogus dichotomies.
sentences.chinese: 爲兩種虛假二分法登臺的舞臺已經準備停當。

sentences.english: I've put my entire life into apple-pie order.
sentences.chinese: 我把自己的一生都安排停當了。

sentences.english: The loaded waggons were standing in the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 收拾停當的大車停在院子裏。
所有的事都鋪排得停停當當。

sentences.english: She worked hard in order that everything would be ready by 6 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 她拼命幹活以便惠臨點時把一切都籌備停當。

sentences.english: After all the preparation, we started the trip to the bride's home.
sentences.chinese: 一切準備停當，要去接新娘了。

sentences.english: We must get the house ready for our guests.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須把房子收拾停當，以期我們的客人隨時入住。

sentences.english: Things like kitchen knives and well prepared pot roasts .
sentences.chinese: 比如研究廚房刀具和準備停當的罐子烤雞。
